promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic basic frilled-lizard water-type wearing dark bracers. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or water. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Dracoarmy, a gigantic basic frilled-lizard water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: water-gun, flash. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word frilled-lizard or water or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sparkling blue background
generatedDescription: Gigantic and agile, Dracoarmy dives into rivers to hunt. Its lightning fast reflexes allow it to capture prey in a flash!
